name: Romain Athus, MD
title: Vice President of Medical Affairs
shortBio: Dr. Athus organizes medications for mission trips, creates liaisons with local hospitals, educates local Haitian citizens about preventive health care.  Provides long-term medications to assist patients with chronic diseases.  Long term vision for Haiti is to someday build local clinics in Haiti, continue active medical education, increase awareness regarding complications of chronic diseases, assist local hospitals with their resources.
